name: Grog's Completely Awesome Solo Adventure
description:
This is a top 2D platform game that is designed in mind for small kids around the age of 5 to teach them about wildlife conservation efforts.

The star of this game is Grog, a Goliath Druid in search of his party after waking up alone in the forest. The aim of the game at the moment is just to reach the final location of where the party is by exploring the forest, but be wary of those annoying little goblins about the place.

The game is designed to be played by clicking your mouse or finger on the game screen in the direction of where you want Grog to go.
